ComicInfo.Title: Hand of Death; Canterbury Ghosts; The Man Who Was Always on Time; Gallery of Horror; Images of Sand; When They Die; Kill Happy; The Monsters
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hand of Death: Mexican matador Juan Savola is in alliance with a witch. When they hassle over money, a hand goes missing, but is restored by the powers of magic. Until the next hassle over money.
Canterbury Ghosts: facts about ghosts spotted in Canterbury
The Man Who Was Always on Time: Darland Fanshaw, owner of the world's largest clock collection, commits murder to obtain a priceless Cellini time-piece. The ghosts of his victims take revenge and make him into a statue on the local clock tower.
Gallery of Horror: horror facts
Images of Sand: French gambler Henri Monard is washed up in Northern Africa, but learns about a Tuareg treasure in the Sahara desert. He kills for it and returns to Paris, indulging in luxury. But the curse of the Djenoun is upon him...
When They Die: horror facts
Kill Happy: Small-grown Warren Darby lusts for money and power. One day he resolves to violence and makes the headlines as "The pint-size Killer".
The Monsters: facts about legendary monsters
